about_the_game:
B.U.D.D. is a sci-fi action platform game with light Metroidvania elements, inspired by games and anime from the late 80's and early 90's.

Bounty Hunter for Hire: Eris Altair

Step into the boots of Eris, an ARCANA bounty hunter-in-training who crash lands on the mysterious alien planet of Verdeo. To make her way back to the space colony, she'll find one of many B.U.D.D. units, versatile helper drones that aid in combat and traversal. After escaping Verdeo, Eris will uncover the secrets of not only her crash, but the organization that hired her, and the entire Lumina System.

A Helping Hand in Battle

Eris can use her B.U.D.D. units to solve puzzles, attack the enemy, extend a combo, or open up opportunities for extra damage. With each level earned, Eris and her BUDD units will learn new skills to overcome the Lumina System's many challenges.

Space Faring Adventure

After repairing your ship, you'll take on missions for colony MARI-XIII and embark on a journey across four planets, each with its own unique challenges, secrets, and boss battles. In addition to the main planets, you can test your skills in multiple timed satellite missions, where precision and speed are rewarded generously.

Features

  • 4 full regions to explore across the Lumina System.
  • 5 Satellite missions to test your skills.
  • Plenty of abilities to learn thanks to your BUDD Units.
  • An introspective story. Just who is Eris? Why did she join ARCANA? And why is the desk clerk so interested in her?
  • Extra challenge modes unlocked after the main campaign.
  • Galleries that fill out as you progress through the game.
  • Plenty of other secrets to find!
